definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ezr 6:15 day (v. BH);—abs. ´[[י]]: Ezr 6:9, Ezr 6:9, Ezr 6:15, emph. [[יוֹמָא]] Da 6:11, Da 6:14; pl. abs. [[יוֹמִין]] v:Da 6:8 +, emph. [[יוֹמַיָּא]] Da 2:28 +; cstr. [[יוֹמֵי]] Da 5:11, and [[יוֹמָת]] (K § 51, 2, Anm. 3) Ezr 4:15, Ezr 4:19; sf. [[יוֹמֵיהוֹן]] Da 2:44;—day, as division of time Da 6:11, 6:14, day of month Ezr 6:15; thirty days Da 6:8, Da 6:13; [[יוֹם בְּיוֹם]] Ezr 6:9 day by day; pl. esp. of duration: ´[[עַתִּיק י]]: one aged of days, aged man Da 7:9, Da 7:13, Da 7:22; [[עָֽלְמָא]] ´[[י]]: days of old Ezr 4:15, Ezr 4:19: of a period: life-time, or reign, of king Da 2:44, Da 5:11; ´[[לִקְחָת י]]: Da 4:31 at the end of the days (appointed time), ´[[בְּאַחֲרִית י]]: Da 2:28 in the latter part of the (future) days.
